keywords.name: Animeid:Burn
keywords.description: Take damage at the start of turn for each stack.

keywords.name: Animeid:Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Animeid:Overhaul
keywords.description: Exhaust a Card to draw any Card from your deck.

keywords.name: Animeid:Overkill
keywords.description: Kill an enemy with excessive damage.

keywords.name: Animeid:oneforall
keywords.description: Apply 10 Strength to your next attack.
